uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

current_free_memory_in_bytes.description: The current amount of free memory (RAM) for system use.

average_free_memory_in_bytes.description: The average amount of free memory (RAM) during the sample period.

current_buffer_memory_in_bytes.description: The current amount of memory (RAM) allocated to buffers.

average_buffer_memory_in_bytes.description: The average amount of memory (RAM) allocated to buffers during the sample period.

current_cache_memory_in_bytes.description: The current amount of memory (RAM) for file cache.

average_cache_memory_in_bytes.description: The average amount of memory (RAM) for file cache during the sample period.
